cards.name: Melisandre
cards.text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Melisandre is attacking, choose and reveal a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent. If that card is a character, you may kneel your faction card to put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Edric Storm
cards.text:
Stealth.
Each player cannot gain more than 3 power each round.

cards.name: Ser Clayton Suggs
cards.text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character, it gets +1 STR or -1 STR until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "What sort of god lets himself be pissed upon by dogs?"

cards.name: Stormlord
cards.text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you do not control a King character, sacrifice a character.

cards.name: Red Keep Servant
cards.text: While you control a King's Landing location, Red Keep Servant gains an [intrigue] icon and cannot be bypassed by stealth.

cards.name: Shadow Assassin
cards.text: Shadow (3). If it is not the challenges phase, sacrifice Shadow Assassin. Reaction: After Shadow Assassin enters play, choose and kill a participating character with lower STR.

cards.name: The King's Justice
cards.text: Unique character only. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel attached character to choose and kill a kneeling character controlled by the losing opponent.

cards.name: Roast Boar
cards.text: Opponent's character only. Reaction: After attached character is knelt, draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: "You should have been at the feast, Tyrion. There has never been a boar so delicious. They cooked it with mushrooms and apples, and it tasted like triumph." <cite>Cersei Lannister </cite>

cards.name: Narrow Sea Galley
cards.text: Shadow (1). Narrow Sea Galley contributes 2 STR to your total for dominance. Reaction: After Narrow Sea Galley comes out of shadows, choose and kneel a character with printed cost 4 or lower.

cards.name: Northern Pyre
cards.text: Challenges Action: If there is a Winter plot card revealed, kneel Northern Pyre to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, set that character's STR to 3.

cards.name: A New Hand
cards.text: Reaction: After a Small Council character you control is killed, kneel your faction card to search your deck for another Small Council character and put it into play, knelt. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: No Crown but Truth
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's character ability would initiate, kill a Maester character to cancel those effects and draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: Now here is a riddle. A clever fool and a foolish wise man. A crown to match your chain, Lord Maester.

cards.name: Ralf the Limper
cards.text: Pillage. Shadow (5). Reaction: After a location is discarded from an opponent's deck, choose a card you control with shadow and return it to shadows. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Theon Greyjoy
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When Theon Greyjoy leaves play, each opponent gains 2 power for their faction. Forced Reaction: After a player counts income, they must choose and kill a character they control.
cards.designer: Card Designed by 2012 European Joust Champion, Stefano Montanari

cards.name: Moqorro
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon and stealth.

cards.name: Orkmont Elite
cards.text: Assault. Pillage. Reaction: After Orkmont Elite discards an attachment using pillage, attach it to an eligible character.

cards.name: Shipborn Bastard
cards.text:
X is the number of cards you control with initiative modifiers. 
+1 Initiative.

cards.name: Wandering Disciple
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wandering Disciple comes out of shadows, put a non-unique Drowned God character into play from your dead pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it.

cards.name: Smiler
cards.text: Ambush (2). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, kneel Smiler to have attached character gain intimidate or renown until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Raider's Scythe
cards.text:
Non-unique [greyjoy] character only.
While attached character is attacking an opponent who controls fewer attachments than you, it does not kneel in the first challenge you initiate each phase.

cards.name: Lonely Light
cards.text:
While Lonely Light is standing, increase the cost for each player to bring cards out of shadow by 1.
+1 Reserve.

cards.name: Southbound Galley
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After Southbound Galley comes out of shadows, choose a defending character with printed STR 4 or lower. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Naval Bombardment
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent who controls fewer locations than you. Until the end of the phase, that player cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges against you.

cards.name: Taking the Shield Islands
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, look at the top 3 cards of the losing opponent's deck. Discard 1 of those cards, and place the others on top of that deck in any order.

cards.name: Crawn, Son of Calor
cards.text:
Shadow (4). Stealth.
You may marshal Crawn, Son of Calor into shadows from your discard pile.

cards.name: Ser Osfryd Kettleblack
cards.text: While you have more cards in hand than any opponent, Ser Osfryd Kettleblack gains renown.

cards.name: Gyles Rosby
cards.text:
If you have no gold in your gold pool during the challenges phase, kill Gyles Rosby.
+2 Income.

cards.name: Ashemark Councilor
cards.text: X is the number of cards with 1 or more gold on it. Reaction: After Ashemark Councilor enters play, place 1 gold on up to 3 cards without gold.

cards.name: Tyrion's Agent
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tyrion's Agent is participating, return it to shadows to have the losing opponent choose a card in their hand. Place that card on top of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Alchemist Apprentice
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel Alchemist Apprentice to choose a non-limited location with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Joffrey's Crossbow
cards.text:
If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains intimidate.
While attached character is participating in a [military] challenge, unique characters must be chosen for claim first.

cards.name: Slander and Lies
cards.text:
Opponent's character only. Ambush (2).
Attached character gains renown.
You may spend power on attached character as if it were 2 gold in your gold pool.

cards.name: Lannisport
cards.text: Reaction: After a [power] challenge is initiated against you, end the challenge immediately with no winner or loser unless the attacking player chooses and discards 1 card from their hand. +1 Income.

cards.name: King's Landing Dromon
cards.text: Shadow (1). You do not return 1 unspent gold to the treasury during the taxation phase. Reaction: After King's Landing Dromon comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Good as Gold
cards.text: Shadow (0). Limited. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, gain 2 gold for each card you control in shadows.

cards.name: The Regent's Council
cards.text: Play only if you control a King character or Cersei Lannister. Challenges Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Small Council trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Red Viper
cards.text: Shadow (5). Stealth. Action: During a challenge in which The Red Viper is attacking, discard a card from shadows to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Ser Manfrey Martell
cards.text:
Renown.
While Ser Manfrey Martell is participating in a challenge, renown and insight trigger when losing the challenge instead of winning the challenge.

cards.name: Ser Guilian Qorgyle
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is declared as an attacker or defender, it loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Ghost Hill Elite
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After Ghost Hill Elite enters play, choose and kill a character with no challenge icons.

cards.name: Maester of the Tor
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Maester of the Tor comes out of shadows, place the top card of your deck in shadows.

cards.name: Southron Informant
cards.text: Ambush (1). Reaction: After Southron Informant enters play during the challenges phase, give control of it to an opponent. Then, discard 1 card at random from that player's hand and draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Viper's Spear
cards.text: Sand Snake or The Red Viper only. Attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent who controls more characters than you.

cards.name: Guerrilla Tactics
cards.text: [martell] character you control only. Shadow (0). Action: Sacrifice Guerrilla Tactics to return attached character to shadows.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Stahleck Melee Champion, Lennart Paga.

cards.name: Yronwood
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered ability to winning a challenge would initiate, kneel Yronwood to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Greenblood Cog
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After Greenblood Cog comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: A Toast to the King
cards.text: Play only if you control a [martell] Lord or Lady character. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and challenge type. If that player does not control a character with a challenge icon of that type, they must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Retribution
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control is killed for [military] claim, if you control fewer characters than the attacking player, that player must choose and kill an attacking character.

cards.name: Benjen Stark
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Benjen Stark is attacking, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges of that type against you.

cards.name: Dirk
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When a character would be discarded from play, place it in it's owners dead pile instead of placing it in their discard pile.

cards.name: Wick Wittlestick
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wick Wittlestick comes out of shadows during a challenge in which you control a participating character, each player must sacrifice a participating character they control.

cards.name: Northern Envoy
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Northern Envoy, reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose 1 non-unique character revealed this way and place it in its owner's discard pile. Shuffle that player's deck.

cards.name: Greyguard Artisan
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Greyguard Artisan comes out of shadows, choose an attachment. Until the end of the phase, treat that card's text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Convert Beyond the Wall
cards.text: While you do not control another Wilding character or Jon Snow, sacrifice Convert Beyond the Wall.

cards.name: Mutineer's Blade
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Mutineer's Blade and sacrifice attached character to choose and kill a participating character.

cards.name: Torch and Oil
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent draws a card or marshals a card into shadows, kneel Torch and Oil to reveal it. If that card is a character, you may sacrifice Torch and Oil to discard that card and stand attached character.

cards.name: The Black Gate
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Black Gate to sacrifice a [thenightswatch] character. Then, put a character with lower printed cost that shares a Trait with that character into play from your hand or shadow area.

cards.name: Grey Galley
cards.text:
Shadow (1).
Grey Galley contributes 1 STR to your side (3 STR instead if it came out of shadows this phase) during any challenge in which you control a defending character.

cards.name: Seventy-Nine Sentinels
cards.text: Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a defending [thenightswatch] character, kneel any number of [thenightswatch] characters with 1 or fewer challenge icons to have each participate in the challenge on your side.
cards.flavor: "They left their posts in life, so in death their watch goes on forever" <cite>Bran Stark</cite>

cards.name: When All is Darkest
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a character comes out of shadows, kneel your faction card to take control of it.

cards.name: Tytos Blackwood
cards.text: Renown. While Tytos Blackwood is participating in a challenge, treat the printed text box of each other character without power as if it were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Howland Reed
cards.text:
Stealth.
Reduce the cost of the first [stark] card you bring out of shadows each round by 2.

cards.name: Steelshanks Walton
cards.text: Dominance Action: Take control of a non-loyal character you own. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Steelshanks, he is called. A soldier of iron loyalty." <cite>Roose Bolton</cite>

cards.name: House Umber Berserkers
cards.text:
Assault. Shadow (X). No attachments.
X is the number of plot cards in your used pile (to a minimum of 1).

cards.name: Northern Patriarch
cards.text: Immune to opponent's Omen plot effects. Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects unless that player moves 1 power from a card they control to Northern Patriarch. (Limit once per round.)
cards.designer: Card Designed by 2012 World Champion, Derek Shoemaker. In Memory of Guy Gray.

cards.name: Trident Guard
cards.text: While an opponent's claim value is lower than yours, Trident Guard gains renown.

cards.name: The Warden of the North
cards.text: [stark] Lord character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and renown. While attached character is participating in a challenge, each opponent cannot play events or bring cards out of shadows.

cards.name: Dubious Loyalties
cards.text: Non-loyal character only. Attached character gains the House Bolton trait. Forced Reaction: After a player wins a challenge in which attached character is participating, that player takes control of attached character.

cards.name: Winterfell Kennels
cards.text: Each Direwolf character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Winterfell Kennels to put a Direwolf card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck.
cards.designer: Card Designed by 2023 Stahleck Melee Champion, David Kennedy.

cards.name: White Harbor Dromon
cards.text: Shadow (1). During a challenge, each participating character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After White Harbor Dromon comes out of shadows during a challenge in which you control a participating character, kneel a character you control to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Above the Rest
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a House Tully character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an additional power using renown.

cards.name: "Wolves in the Hills"
cards.text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, return an attacking Direwolf character to your hand to apply [intrigue] or [power] claim instead.

cards.name: Magister Illyrio
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (5). Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 cards in shadows.

cards.name: Ser Harry Strickland
cards.text: Shadow (3). Renown. Reaction: After Ser Harry Strickland enters play, choose an Army or Mercenary character. Stand that character and have it gain a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Red Lamb
cards.text: While you control Ser Barristan Selmy, Red Lamb gains a [power] icon and the Knight trait.

cards.name: War Elephants
cards.text:
Intimidate. No attachments.
War Elephants cannot be placed during setup, or marshaled into play.

cards.name: Sorrowful Man
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sorrowful Man comes out of shadows, swap a character in an opponent's discard pile with a character in their dead pile.

cards.name: White Graces
cards.text: Interrupt: When White Graces is discarded from your hand or deck, put it into play as a duplicate on a Lady or Grace character instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Queen of Meereen
cards.text: Lady character only. Attached character gains the Queen trait. Action: Kneel Queen of Meereen to discard any number of cards from your hand. Reduce the cost of the next card you marshal, ambush or bring out of shadows this phase by 2 for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Poisoned Locusts
cards.text:
Opponent's character only. Shadow (0). Terminal.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets -1 STR for each attachment it has and is killed if its STR is 0.
cards.flavor: "They are rolled in spice before the honey, so they are sweet and hot at once." <cite>Hizdahr zo Loraq</cite>

cards.name: Slaver's Bay
cards.text:
Each participating character is killed if its STR is 1 or lower during:
- [military] challenges, if you control Astapor.
- [intrigue] challenges, if you control Yunkai.
- [power] challenges, if you control Meereen.

cards.name: Qartheen Galley
cards.text: Shadow (1). You are considered to have 1 fewer card in hand. Reaction: After Qartheen Galley comes out of shadows, choose a card with shadow in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

cards.name: Take To The Sky!
cards.text: Play only if you control a Dragon character. Interrupt: When a Dragon or Stormborn character would be killed or discarded from play, save it and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Stallion Who Mounts the World
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge as the attacking player, kneel your faction card to search your deck for a Dothraki character and put it into play unless the losing opponent chooses and kills 2 characters they control.

cards.name: Baelor Brightsmile
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which Baelor Brightsmile is participating, reveal the top card of your deck. You may place that card facedown under Baelor Brightsmile as a duplicate.

cards.name: Megga Tyrell
cards.text: Reaction: After 1 or more characters are removed from a challenge, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Butterbumps
cards.text: Shadow (3). Challenges Action: During a challenge in which Butterbumps is participating, return him to shadows to choose a participating character with higher STR than him. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: Horn Hill Elite
cards.text:
Assault. Intimidate. No attachments.
While Horn Hill Elite is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each standing [tyrell] character you control.

cards.name: Undercity Spymaster
cards.text: Shadow (3). Stealth.

cards.name: Agent of the Citadel
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Agent of the Citadel is participating, reveal the top card of your deck to reduce the cost of the next card you bring out of shadows this phase by 2.

cards.name: Enameled Green Armor
cards.text: Attached character gains renown. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Enameled Green Armor to choose a participating character with lower STR. That character contributes its STR to your side this challenge.

cards.name: Highgarden Destrier
cards.text:
Limit 1 copy per character.
Character with printed STR 3 or lower only. 
Attached character gets +1 STR for each character you control with printed cost 3 or lower.

cards.name: The Whispering Sound
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a location enters play during the challenges phase, kneel The Whispering Sound to draw 2 cards. Then, choose a card in your hand and place it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Trading Galley
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Trading Galley comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. +1 Income

cards.name: Beneath the Petals
cards.text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When Beneath the Petals is revealed from your hand or shadow area, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR and gains stealth. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Growing Influence
cards.text: Play only if you are the first player. Marshaling Action: Give X gold from your gold pool to an opponent. Then, choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by that player and remove it from the game. At the beginning of the next phase, put that character into play under your control.

cards.name: Lysa Arryn
cards.text: Renown. While your initiative value is 0, Lysa Arryn contributes her STR to each challenge in which you control a participating loyal or House Arryn character.

cards.name: Biter
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After Biter kneels a character with lower STR using intimidate, sacrifice Biter to kill that character.

cards.name: The Bastard of Driftmark
cards.text: Taxation Action: Search your deck for a Warship location, reveal it, and place it in shadows. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Alleras the Sphinx
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Alleras the Sphinx is participating, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card, reveal it, and place it facedown under your agenda. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Elder Brother
cards.text: While your revealed plot card has the The Seven trait, Elder Brother cannot be killed.

cards.name: Harrenhal Cupbearer
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Harrenhal Cupbearer is participating, return it to shadows to choose and kneel a non-Spy character controlled by the losing opponent.

cards.name: Candle in the Dark
cards.text: Attached character cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered card ability would initiate, if that card has shadow, kneel attached character to cancel those effects.

cards.name: The Warden of the East
cards.text: House Arryn character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and +2 STR. Reaction: After a character is revealed from an opponent's hand, deck or shadow area, attached character gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Myr
cards.text: Action: Kneel Myr to reduce the cost of the next out-of-faction card you ambush or bring out of shadows this phase by 3.

cards.name: Ibbenese Whaler
cards.text: Shadow (2). Taxation Action: If you have no cards in hand, kneel and return Ibbenese Whaler to shadows to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: The Milkwater
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel and sacrifice The Milkwater to have each character lose all keywords and immunities until the end of the phase. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: "Widows Ford"
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After an attachment or location enters your discard pile, place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Reinstatement
cards.text: Standing Action: Kneel your faction card to put a Small Council character into play from your discard pile.

cards.name: Battle Beneath the Wall
cards.text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, a player must declare all eligible characters when declaring attackers or defenders during a challenge of that type.

cards.name: City of Shadows
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a card you control with shadow and return it to your hand. (You may return it to shadows instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)

cards.name: Doom of Valyria
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player draws cards until they have 3 cards in hand, if able. Then, they may discard X cards from their hand to choose X cards. Discard each card not chosen from play.

cards.name: The War of the Five Kings
cards.text: X is the number of opponent's you do not support.

cards.name: The Minstrel's Muse
cards.text: You cannot play more than 3 events this round. Reaction: After a Song event is played, draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Age of Heroes
cards.text: When Revealed: Search your deck for an attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if it is Legacy or Valyrian Steel). Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Striking at Dawn
cards.text: Each character's STR cannot be raised or lowered.

cards.name: Strained Reserves
cards.text: Each player without a Summer plot revealed cannot marshal, ambush or bring more than 2 cards out of shadows this round.

cards.name: Armed to the Teeth
cards.text: Your deck cannot include non-Weapon attachments. After all agendas are announced, search your deck for up to 7 different attachments, reveal them, and place them facedown under this agenda. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X or lower into play from under this agenda.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Castle Stahleck Joust Champion, Marti Foz Hernandez.

cards.name: The Small Council
cards.text: You may include non-loyal Small Council characters from any faction in your deck. You must include at least 7 different Small Council characters in your deck. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a standing Small Council character you control, and have it gain 1 power. Then, if you control a King or Queen character, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Trading with Braavos
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. Your deck may include non-loyal Warship locations from any faction. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each Warship location. Reaction: After a neutral or out-of-faction location enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
